```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)

library(tidyverse)
```

```{r read in data}
df <- read_csv("2019_aid.csv")
```


```{r cars}
ly <- hms("26:18:12")

ly.dec <- as.numeric(ly) / 101.3 / 60

secs <- (ly.dec - floor(ly.dec)) * 60

ly.pace <- ms(paste(floor(ly.dec), secs, sep = ":"))

start <- as.POSIXct("2019-07-27 04:00:00", tz = "EST")

df <-
  df %>%
  mutate(ly.total  =  (as.numeric(ly.pace) * df$total.dist)) %>%
  mutate(ly.total = ly.total + start) %>%
  mutate(ly.total = format(ly.total, "%H:%M:%S"))
```
